title: Free font? or not?
content:
Hi!

I'm pretty sure this font can be this one [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/jackson/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115074217/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/jackson/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/jackson/")

However i'm wondering if there's a free font very similar to this one... Because I'm almost 100% convinced that who did this logo used a free font..

Thank you for your help

| --- | --- |
| [logor32.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140115074217/http:/typophile.com/files/logor32.jpg) | 16.91 KB |
author: desmetadata

comments.content: i'm going to say nope. just get Jackson & run with it.
